channel.title: Help with adding commands into 508 server

item.title: Help with adding commands into 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Replace:

if(cmd[0].equals("ancientsaff")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4675, 1);
With:

if(cmd[0].equals("ancientsaff")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4675, 1); }

Read full topic
item.source: Help with adding commands into 508 server

item.title: Help with adding commands into 508 server
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

idk bout the catch ones, but I do know 1 of them. go to the file and type Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9075, 99999; then change the “;” to a “)” THEN add “;”

Read full topic
item.source: Help with adding commands into 508 server

item.title: Help with adding commands into 508 server
item.dc:creator: @laxmaster213 laxmaster213
item.description:

I hope that you can help me!
